content:
In this week's podcast our editors discuss why globalisation has run out of steam

At the World Economic Forum in Davos, Anne McElvoy asks our editor-in-chief, Zanny Minton-Beddoes, and Patrick Foulis, our business-affairs editor, why globalisation has run out of steam —and what will future economic growth look like?
Title: Is this the era of slowbalisation?

paperStatistics.title: Is this the era of slowbalisation?
paperStatistics.desc: In this week's podcast our editors discuss why globalisation has run out of steam
